com.yantra.api.ydm

Interface createShipmentInvoice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YDMApi, YIFApi

    public interface createShipmentInvoice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document createShipmentInvoice(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The createShipmentInvoice API is an optional API or agent that can be run to create invoices for the shipment.

    • Method Detail

      • createShipmentInvoice

        org.w3c.dom.Document createShipmentInvoice(YFSEnvironment env,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                    throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException
        The createShipmentInvoice API is an optional API or agent that can be run to create invoices for the shipment. A shipment may have lines from different orders. A new invoice is created for each order in the shipment. For each shipment line, the invoicable quantity is either the quantity on the shipment or the invoicable quantity on the order line, whichever is least.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        This API invokes the following user exits:


          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetHeaderChargesForShipmentUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.OMPGetInvoiceNoUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetLineChargesForShipmentUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE
            If the line tax is reduced by this user exit call and the order is not completely invoiced, the order will not be updated until the order is completely invoiced.

          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSConvertCurrencyUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSDetermineDateForPricingUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetInvoicePricingQtyUE
            This user exit is called to override the quantity to be considered for invoicing.


        Events Raised:
        CREATE_SHIPMENT_INVOICE/ON_INVOICE_CREATION: For more information, see the associated files.
        Data Published - YDM_CREATE_SHIPMENT_INVOICE.ON_INVOICE_CREATION.xml,
        DTD - YDM_CREATE_SHIPMENT_INVOICE.ON_INVOICE_CREATION_dtd.txt and
        Key Data - order_dbd.txt

        Template Support: Yes

        Audits:
        YFS_SHIPMENT_STATUS_AUDIT record is written indicating the from and to status change of the shipment.

        Pre-conditions: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Output Template Support: No

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains the list of created invoice(s). For details on the output, refer to the associated output files. The output template for this API cannot be made document specific.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
